overview: Martial arts are excellent for helping a child to develop self-esteem and confidence. When kids develop these, parents have less to worry about with their children. Children with improved self esteem are much less likely to succumb to peer pressure as they develop the confidence to say “no!” Children also learn how to defend themselves, including self defense skills to protect themselves from bullies. And that’s not all. They also develop great motor skills, self discipline, leadership, focus, time management and more. For more information please visit our website http://www.eliteafterschool.com/
